document.full_text: japanese officials are readying a new approach to cooling reactors at the fukushima nuclear plant after discovering an olympic swimming pool-sized pond of radioactive water in the basement of a unit crippled by the march earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: japan readies new tactics for fukushima after setback
lines_and_colors: japanese officials are readying a new approach to cooling reactors at the fukushima nuclear plant after discovering an olympic swimming pool-sized pond of radioactive water in the basement of a unit crippled by the march earthquake and tsunami.
